title: Summoners' Society Looking for community event managers

embed.description: League management team aka LMT. When you are part of LMT: You are the league community team, you are here to grow and expanding the community by being involved it. You are the friendly person that they can approach and that will always help them. You are the face of Summoner Society.

body:
Hello Summoners, 

Summoners' Society is one of the largest active league of legends community groups on facebook in OCE. We are looking for people that interested improving, growing and being involved with the community. You will be trained in how to run tournaments, get to be a part of a awesome team and have lots of cool opportunities in the future to be involved in so much more! 

If you feel like this is you, 

Please, feel free to apply! 

Look forward to hearing from you guys!
